rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Spacious entrance leading to living area and outdoor space, includes a small foyer with reception desk if needed.

rooms.name: Living Room/Dining Area
rooms.description: Open concept area serving as main living and dining space, ensuring ample daylight from east-facing windows for positive Vastu energy flow.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen designed for family cooking needs with storage, adjacent to a small prep area, well-ventilated, ideally placed in the south-western part for efficient workflow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Private master bedroom on the east side of the house to ensure morning sunlight and optimal Vastu alignment. Includes walk-in closet and attached bathroom with proper ventilation.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed for guests, placed opposite the master bedroom ensuring balanced energy distribution; includes a built-in closet.

rooms.name: Kids' Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious kids' room on the west side to provide balance and good air circulation. Can include multifunctional furniture.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library space in the north-east corner for intellectual growth, ensuring calm ambience with proper lighting and seating arrangements; shelves integrated with wall design.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Modern bathroom placed near master bedroom for convenience. Well-ventilated to manage moisture levels.
